idea:
We introduce ourselves as professional company of civil construction & infra projects. We have executed & completed many prestigious projects successfully involving all below mentioned works.
1. Waterproofing work of civil structures using specialized chemical treatment.
2. Structural Repairs, Plumbing, and Sanitary Work
3. All types of flooring, cladding & painting Work.
4. Fabrication of Structural work, MS Tank, Gas & oil pipe lines.
5. Excavation and landscaping Work etc.
6. Interior Furnishing Work.
7. Aluminum Cladding & Glazing Work.
8. Construction of RCC Framed Structures.
name: KUMAWAT INFRASTRUCTURE PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:

All set to grow places - have several aces up our sleeve for scalability, with retaining customer experience.

idea:
Parametric Solutions Pvt Ltd, The Advanced Industrial Training, Designing Drafting, Re-Engineering Technology And Manufacturing I.E CAD / CAM / FEA / CNC / HVAC / MEP In Thane, Maharashtra, India.


Parametric Solution is a leading training network of India in the field of CAD/CAM/CAE , Mechanical draftsman, Civil draftsman , Piping draftsman, Piping engineering, Civil Auto CAD course , Civil Auto CAD apprenticeship , Architecture Auto CAD, Micro station CAD, Pro-E Creo, Solid work ,UG CAD, CAM, Master diploma in process engineering, Master diploma in interior Auto CAD, Master diploma in 3D Max, Master diploma in Electrical CAD, Franchise Center for CAD, CAM,MEP,HVAC Course, Electrical Designing & Drafting, Plumbing Designing & Drafting , Green Building Course , Green Building LEED course , Diploma in Mechanical CAD, CAM, CNC, Master CAM, CNC Programming & Operating, Master diploma in Plumbing Designing & Drafting , Master Diploma in Fire Fighting Designing , Advance diploma in Ms Office, Advance diploma in Tally, Advance diploma in DTP course, Website Development course, Franchise Center for CAD, CNC, HVAC, MEP courses provides in Thane centers and various centers in India.
name: PARAMETRIC SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED
